div.div: Read in the Network Config from Scenario Manager, and service config for when to do each operation

div.div:
From the NetworkConfig and ServiceConfig's schema requirement, build out the payload for Restful API requests.
With UUID generated, for VPC, Subnet, etc... So can use to connect them together.
